# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-service-overlayvpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1073/org/openo/sdno/overlay/overlayvpnservice-deployment/1.0.0-RC0/overlayvpnservice-deployment-1.0.0-RC0.zip && unzip -q -o -B sdno-service-overlayvpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip && rm -f sdno-service-overlayvpn-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8503
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1073 > OPENO_VERSION
